Description: Foot and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; convex ring foot with light groove at its top; glazed black (flaked off in places) on interior and exterior; reserved: resting surface and underside; inscription cut on underside. Castulo cup.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 561)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2083)
